values: The Liberating Law of the Spirit of LifeThe Liberating Law of the Spirit of Life

The death of Christ does not turn away the wrath of God from all people. In order to benefit from the work that God has done outside of us, we must now experience the work that he does within us by the Holy Spirit. What is this work and how is it related to the gift of justification?The death of Christ does not turn away the wrath of God from all people.
